id: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller
name: Madrix® Nebula LED DMX Pixel Controller
shortDescription: The MADRIX NEBULA is your gateway to breathtaking LED pixel installations. This advanced SPI decoder connects directly to your LEDs, delivering high-quality signals over Ethernet or USB for seamless, vibrant visuals
description: Upto pixel perfect control of LED lights
Ethernet network or USB data communication
Quality output of 8 universes
License supports lifetime upgrades
Developed & made in Germany
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
produces image quality display

specifications.Ethernet: 2 x RJ45, Auto MDI-X, Daisy-Chain Support, 10/100 Mbit/S
specifications.Network Protocols: Art-Net (1,2,3,4, incl. ArtSync) Streaming ACN (sACN / ANSI E1.31)
specifications.USB: 1 x Port USB 2.0 Type-B, Female Socket

name: Nicolaudie® LED Stick DE3 DMX
shortDescription: The feature rich STICK-DE3 has been designed to provide a control solution for the most demanding of projects and yet easy enough for anyone to use. The controller integrates a graphical color display, allowing scene photos to be displayed. Easily view the selected zone, scene name and design without the need to navigate through complex menus.
description: New glass design with Graphical color display
Color/dimmer/speed palette
500 scenes, 10 zones
1024 DMX channels
USB & Ethernet connectivity
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
RS232, ports, infra red

specifications.USB: 1 x Port USB 2.0 Type-B, Female Socket

name: Madrix® LED software License Key
shortDescription: MADRIX 5 allows you to produce extraordinary live visuals. You don't need to invest a lot of time for programming. With MADRIX 5, you quickly create visuals and bring creative and diverse lighting effects to any LED installation. In addition, apply many advanced features you would not want to miss.
description: Upto pixel perfect control of LED lights
Supports DMX channels from 1024 to 1,048,576
Start, Entry, Basic, Professional, Ultimate, Maximum & programmer License options
License supports lifetime upgrades
Developed & made in Germany
Compatible with wide range of LED digital lights
produces image quality display from 128x128 to 2048x1024

name: Aluminim Profile - AL- OS - 01
shortDescription: DALUX® LED aluminium profiles are engineered for targeted lighting applications, delivering both function and style. Choose between standalone profiles with diffusers or pre-assembled options featuring integrated LED linear strips for quick and effortless installation. To complete your setup, a full range of accessories — including end caps, mounting brackets, and suspension links — are available to suit any installation need.
description: Excruted from high quality alumminium stock
Purpose designed extusions for specialised applications
Sturdy profile with correct gauge for application
Enhanced heat management increase LED light quality & life
Correct installation accessories for application
Custom color options available - MOQ & Lead times apply

name: Microwave motion Sensor-MW-1
shortDescription: Our Microwave Motion Sensors are designed for precision, offering highly sensitive and reliable motion detection. Unlike traditional infrared sensors, microwave sensors use high-frequency electromagnetic waves to detect movement, providing greater accuracy, wider coverage, and improved performance in challenging environments.
description: Reliable accurate detection of motion
Very low no laod power consumption
Affordable quality product
Safety certified product
Compact design

id: Light sensors | Day light sensors - ELKO
name: Light sensors | Day light sensors
shortDescription: Automatically switch street lights, garden lights, shop windows, and displays based on ambient light levels. The SKS-100 uses an external sensor to monitor brightness and activates lighting according to your set threshold — simple, efficient, and reliable.
description: Automatic light control based on ambient brightness
Ideal for outdoor and commercial applications
Easy setting of switching levels directly on the device
Energy-saving and weather-resistant design
Control input for additional control
Adjustable time delay to eliminate short term fluctuation in illumination
Surface or DIN rail mount

id: Light sensors | Day light sensors - Merrytek
name: Light sensors | Day light sensors
shortDescription: Automatically switch street lights, garden lights, shop windows, and displays based on ambient light levels. The SKS-100 uses an external sensor to monitor brightness and activates lighting according to your set threshold — simple, efficient, and reliable.
description: Automatic light control based on ambient brightness
Ideal for outdoor and commercial applications

Control input for additional control
Adjustable time delay to eliminate short term fluctuation in illumination
Surface or DIN rail mount

name: PIR Motion Wardrobe Sensor - Merrytek
shortDescription: Open your wardrobe — lights turn on automatically Close it — lights turn off. Save energy and enjoy effortless, motion-activated lighting with our compact PIR sensor. Easy to install. Smart. Efficient.
description: Motion-Activated: Lights turn on automatically when you open your wardrobe.
Energy Efficient: Lights switch off after a set time without movement.
Easy Installation: Compact and discreet design fits neatly inside wardrobes, cabinets, and closets.
Smart Sensitivity: Advanced PIR technology ensures accurate motion detection with minimal false triggers.
Customizable Timing: Set delay times according to your preference.

name: PIR Proximity Wardrobe Sensor - Merrytek
shortDescription: Discover a smarter way to light your wardrobes, cabinets, and closets with the Merrytek PIR Proximity Wardrobe Sensor. Designed with precision and convenience in mind, this sensor offers effortless, hands-free illumination the moment you reach for your belongings — and powers down automatically to save energy when no longer needed.
description: Motion-Activated: Lights turn on automatically when you open your wardrobe.
Energy Efficient: Lights switch off after a set time without movement.
Easy Installation: Compact and discreet design fits neatly inside wardrobes, cabinets, and closets.
Smart Sensitivity: Advanced PIR technology ensures accurate motion detection with minimal false triggers.
Customizable Timing: Set delay times according to your preference.

name: MEANWELL® LRS power supplies - 150-24
shortDescription: The MEAN WELL LRS-150 series is a highly reliable and cost-effective single-output enclosed power supply. Designed for a wide range of industrial and automation applications, the LRS-150 offers excellent performance, high efficiency, and a compact design, making it an ideal choice for space-constrained installations. With various output voltage options and comprehensive protection features, the LRS-150 ensures stable and safe power delivery for your critical systems.
description: Ultra compact & 1U low profile for easy installation
Very low no laod power consumption ~ ❮.75W
300V AC input surge protection
Most economical model | Non - PFC
High Reliability | High Efficiency
Cooling by Free Air Convection
LED Power-On Indicator

specifications.EMC Emission: Compliance to EN55032 Class B, EN61000-3-2,-3
specifications.Overvoltage Protection: 115% ~ 135% of rated output voltage, shut down o/p
specifications.Short Circuit Protection: Hiccup mode, recovers automatically after fault removal

name: MEANWELL® LRS power supplies - 350-24
shortDescription: The MEAN WELL LRS-350 series is a highly reliable and cost-effective single-output enclosed power supply. Designed for a wide range of industrial and automation applications, the LRS-350 offers excellent performance, high efficiency, and a compact design, making it an ideal choice for space-constrained installations. With various output voltage options and comprehensive protection features, the LRS-350 ensures stable and safe power delivery for your critical systems.
